## Feature Description
A clear description of what you'd like to see.

## Problem it Solves
What problem does this feature solve? Why is it useful?

## Proposed Solution
How do you think this should work?

## Alternatives Considered
Any alternative solutions you've thought about.

## Additional Context
Any other information, mockups, or examples.
